pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: To support its bulb, IVYSAUR’s legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: VENUSAUR’s flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when CHARMANDER is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: A CHARIZARD flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling SQUIRTLE to swim at high speeds.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness in battle.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: This POKéMON has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: When exposed to a strong wind, a GASTLY’s gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don’t approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: SNORLAX’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its big belly as a place to play.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: ARTICUNO is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: ZAPDOS is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control fire. If injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: A DRATINI continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: A DRAGONAIR stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter the weather around it by loosing energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It can circle the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted POKéMON that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

pokemon.name: Chikorita
pokemon.description: It waves its leaf around to keep foes at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, creating a friendly atmosphere that becalms the battlers.

pokemon.name: Bayleef
pokemon.description: A BAYLEEF’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each leaf is a small tree shoot. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

pokemon.name: Meganium
pokemon.description: The fragrance of a MEGANIUM’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, it gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

pokemon.name: Cyndaquil
pokemon.description: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the POKéMON is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.

pokemon.name: Quilava
pokemon.description: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.

pokemon.name: Typhlosion
pokemon.description: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. TYPHLOSION create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

pokemon.name: Totodile
pokemon.description: Despite its small body, TOTODILE’s jaws are very powerful. While it may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough strength to cause serious injury.

pokemon.name: Croconaw
pokemon.description: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like fishhooks, they become irremovably embedded.

pokemon.name: Feraligatr
pokemon.description: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs to charge the foe with incredible speed.

pokemon.name: Treecko
pokemon.description: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.

pokemon.name: Grovyle
pokemon.description: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.

pokemon.name: Sceptile
pokemon.description: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.

pokemon.name: Torchic
pokemon.description: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.

pokemon.name: Combusken
pokemon.description: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

pokemon.name: Blaziken
pokemon.description: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

pokemon.name: Mudkip
pokemon.description: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.

pokemon.name: Marshtomp
pokemon.description: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

pokemon.name: Swampert
pokemon.description: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

pokemon.name: Ralts
pokemon.description: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.

pokemon.name: Kirlia
pokemon.description: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.

pokemon.name: Gardevoir
pokemon.description: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.

moves.name: vine-whip
moves.description: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines.

moves.name: growth
moves.description: Forces the body to grow and heightens SP. ATK.

moves.name: synthesis
moves.description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

moves.name: sweet-scent
moves.description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness.

moves.name: razor-leaf
moves.description: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: tackle
moves.description: Charges the foe with a full- body tackle.

moves.name: sleep-powder
moves.description: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.

moves.name: poison-powder
moves.description: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.

moves.name: leech-seed
moves.description: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.

moves.name: solar-beam
moves.description: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.

moves.name: growl
moves.description: Growls cutely to reduce the foe’s ATTACK.

moves.name: scratch
moves.description: Scratches the foe with sharp claws.

moves.name: slash
moves.description: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: ember
moves.description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

moves.name: flamethrower
moves.description: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

moves.name: fire-spin
moves.description: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.

moves.name: dragon-rage
moves.description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.

moves.name: smokescreen
moves.description: Lowers the foe’s accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.

moves.name: rage
moves.description: Raises the user’s ATTACK every time it is hit.

moves.name: scary-face
moves.description: Frightens with a scary face to sharply reduce SPEED.

moves.name: tail-whip
moves.description: Wags the tail to lower the foe’s DEFENSE.

moves.name: rapid-spin
moves.description: Spins the body at high speed to strike the foe.

moves.name: withdraw
moves.description: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.

moves.name: skull-bash
moves.description: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: bite
moves.description: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.

moves.name: bubble
moves.description: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe’s SPEED.

moves.name: water-gun
moves.description: Squirts water to attack the foe.

moves.name: hydro-pump
moves.description: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.

moves.name: protect
moves.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

moves.name: rain-dance
moves.description: Boosts the power of WATER- type moves for 5 turns.

moves.name: wing-attack
moves.description: Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.

moves.name: gust
moves.description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

moves.name: mirror-move
moves.description: Counters the foe’s attack with the same move.

moves.name: sand-attack
moves.description: Reduces the foe’s accuracy by hurling sand in its face.

moves.name: quick-attack
moves.description: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

moves.name: whirlwind
moves.description: Blows away the foe with wind and ends the battle.

moves.name: agility
moves.description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost SPEED.

moves.name: feather-dance
moves.description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.

moves.name: slam
moves.description: Slams the foe with a long tail, vine, etc.

moves.name: thunder-shock
moves.description: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

moves.name: thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

moves.name: double-team
moves.description: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.

moves.name: light-screen
moves.description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

moves.name: thunder
moves.description: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.

moves.name: thunder-wave
moves.description: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.

moves.name: hypnosis
moves.description: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.

moves.name: destiny-bond
moves.description: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.

moves.name: confuse-ray
moves.description: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.

moves.name: mean-look
moves.description: Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.

moves.name: spite
moves.description: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe’s last move.

moves.name: night-shade
moves.description: Inflicts damage identical to the user’s level.

moves.name: lick
moves.description: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.

moves.name: curse
moves.description: A move that functions differently for GHOSTS.

moves.name: shadow-punch
moves.description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

moves.name: body-slam
moves.description: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

moves.name: sheer-cold
moves.description: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

moves.name: safeguard
moves.description: A mystical force prevents all status problems.

moves.name: sing
moves.description: A soothing song lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

moves.name: ice-beam
moves.description: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.

moves.name: perish-song
moves.description: Any POKéMON hearing this song faints in 3 turns.

moves.name: mist
moves.description: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.

moves.name: dream-eater
moves.description: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.

moves.name: block
moves.description: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.

moves.name: headbutt
moves.description: A ramming attack that may cause flinching.

moves.name: yawn
moves.description: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping next turn.

moves.name: snore
moves.description: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.

moves.name: rest
moves.description: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.

moves.name: covet
moves.description: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.

moves.name: amnesia
moves.description: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.

moves.name: rollout
moves.description: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.

moves.name: belly-drum
moves.description: Maximizes ATTACK while sacrificing HP.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

moves.name: reflect
moves.description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

moves.name: blizzard
moves.description: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.

moves.name: mind-reader
moves.description: Senses the foe’s action to ensure the next move’s hit.

moves.name: powder-snow
moves.description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause freezing.

moves.name: drill-peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: peck
moves.description: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.

moves.name: charge
moves.description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

moves.name: detect
moves.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

moves.name: defense-curl
moves.description: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise DEFENSE.

moves.name: heat-wave
moves.description: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.

moves.name: endure
moves.description: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

moves.name: wrap
moves.description: Wraps and squeezes the foe 2 to 5 times with vines, etc.

moves.name: leer
moves.description: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.

moves.name: twister
moves.description: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

moves.name: outrage
moves.description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

moves.name: sky-attack
moves.description: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.

moves.name: swift
moves.description: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.

moves.name: flame-wheel
moves.description: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.

moves.name: screech
moves.description: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe’s DEFENSE.

moves.name: giga-drain
moves.description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

moves.name: pursuit
moves.description: Inflicts bad damage if used on a foe switching out.

moves.name: mega-drain
moves.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

moves.name: absorb
moves.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

moves.name: pound
moves.description: Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.

moves.name: fury-cutter
moves.description: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.

moves.name: leaf-blade
moves.description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: false-swipe
moves.description: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: focus-energy
moves.description: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: bulk-up
moves.description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

moves.name: sky-uppercut
moves.description: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.

moves.name: double-kick
moves.description: A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.

moves.name: blaze-kick
moves.description: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.

moves.name: fire-punch
moves.description: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.

moves.name: endeavor
moves.description: Gains power if the user’s HP is lower than the foe’s HP.

moves.name: foresight
moves.description: Negates the foe’s efforts to heighten evasiveness.

moves.name: bide
moves.description: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.

moves.name: whirlpool
moves.description: Traps and hurts the foe in a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.

moves.name: mud-sport
moves.description: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.

moves.name: take-down
moves.description: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.

moves.name: earthquake
moves.description: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.

moves.name: muddy-water
moves.description: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

moves.name: mud-shot
moves.description: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.

moves.name: teleport
moves.description: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.

moves.name: imprison
moves.description: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

moves.name: psychic
moves.description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

moves.name: confusion
moves.description: A psychic attack that may cause confusion.

moves.name: calm-mind
moves.description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

moves.name: future-sight
moves.description: Heightens inner power to strike 2 turns later.

moves.name: mud-slap
moves.description: Hurls mud in the foe’s face to reduce its accuracy.
